nodes.text: The Synthlimb blaster was a model of cybernetic weapon implant produced by Athakam Medtech and available in the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The enhancement cost 4000 credits to purchase.
The Synthlimb blaster was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013 and written by Sterling Hershey.
